summary: Lolla Borne is a beautiful Nord. She reached level 134 by playing legendary perks.  Or you can use this mod to transfer her face to your own save.
descriptionHtml:
Requirements:
All DLCs
Leveler's Tower by Willie Sea.
KS Hairdos renewal
True Brows
Better Females
Cute Eyes

Lolla Borne is a beautiful Nord. She reached level 134 by playing legendary perks. (Check the images.)
She sided with the Imperials in the war.
The images will tell you which quests were completed.
She tried to avoid radiant quests, but there were a few she had to complete.
She didn't start the quest Innocence Lost, because that is up to you how you wish for her to proceed.
To find Esbern she spoke to the Argonian bartender in The Bee and Barb. This means you can decide whether you join the thieves guild.
If you do join, the secret room in the Leveler's Tower has buttons that teleport you directly to all the Stones of Barenziah.

All locations found.
Thane of all 9 holds.
All Houses owned.
Treasure maps not used.
Collected all dragon priest masks.
The Bonds of Matrimony not done.
I would not Kill Paarthurnax.
All the Spell Books found are in the living room.
Not all ingredient effects known, just enough to reach 100. There are many ingredients left in pots in the basement if you wish to make the skill legendary.
Sided with the Dawnguard to kill the Vampires. The Dawnguard will still want quests to be done.
Defeated karstaag
I didn't do the quest in regard to the Retaking Thirsk or The chief of Thirsk Hall.
Read all Black Books

Some other mods that I used, but aren't essential:
Diaries of training
Rideable Broom
Mannequin Female Vyctoria
Kyne's Gate
Chest of Skill Books
The People of Skyrim Ultimate Edition. This mod enable me to find so many other locations.
author: SnowQueen
